name: Toddler Scholar
description:
*****FLASHING ALERT****

What in the world is this game?

You, a genius toddler has awoken. Through some forbidden magic, you understood how dangerous Math is. Can you defeat Math's soldiers once and for all?

Controls

Movement: WASD

Roll:  Space

Attack: Left Mouse Button

Switch Weapons: Scroll Wheel

Shop: TAB

The future is in your hand! Please help us destroy those number 2s!
